name: Idempotent removal - repeating the operation
description:
To protect data consistency and the user experience,
  the system should clearly communicate errors and block invalid operations.
descriptionHtml:
To protect data consistency and the user experience,
the system should clearly communicate errors and block invalid operations.
statusMessage:
[HTTP status] 
Expecting actual:
  200
to be in:
  [404, 400, 204]
statusTrace:
java.lang.AssertionError: [HTTP status] 
Expecting actual:
  200
to be in:
  [404, 400, 204]

	at eu.delimata.bookstore.stepdefinitions.AuthorsSteps.authorAlreadyUnavailable(AuthorsSteps.java:223)
	at ✽.the system informs me the author item is already unavailable and no further changes are made(classpath:eu/delimata/bookstore/authors-negative.feature:42)

steps.name: Given I have valid permissions to manage the bookstore
Given an author exists in the bookstore
And I have removed that author from the bookstore
When I attempt to remove the same author again
Then the system informs me the author item is already unavailable and no further changes are made
steps.statusMessage:
[HTTP status] 
Expecting actual:
  200
to be in:
  [404, 400, 204]
steps.statusTrace:
